00001 from molDynamics.gulp.potentials.TwoAtomPotential import TwoAtomPotential
00002 from pyre.components.Component import Component
00003 from os import linesep
00004 
00005 class MorseGulp(TwoAtomPotential):
00006     '''representation of the lennard-jones potential for gulp'''
00007     
00008     class Inventory(TwoAtomPotential.Inventory):
00009         import pyre.inventory as inv
00010         DFit = inv.str("Fit D", default = None)
00011         DFit.meta['tip'] = "whether to change this parameter during a fitting run"
00012         DFit.validator = inv.choice([None,'True','False'])
00013         aFit = inv.bool("Fit a", default = None)
00014         aFit.meta['tip'] = "whether to change this parameter during a fitting run"
00015         aFit.validator = inv.choice([None,'True','False'])
00016         r0Fit = inv.bool("Fit r0", default = None)
00017         r0Fit.meta['tip'] = "whether to change this parameter during a fitting run"
00018         r0Fit.validator = inv.choice([None,'True','False'])
00019                 
00020     def __init__(self, atom1, atom2):
00021         TwoAtomPotential.__init__(self, atom1, atom2)
00022         self.ii=self.inventory
00023         self.ii.atom1 = atom1
00024         self.ii.atom2 = atom2
00025         # add things to the repository
00026         
00027     def write(self):            
00028         return "morse "\
00029             + self.writeInterIntra()\
00030             + self.writeBonding()\
00031             + self.writeScaling()\
00032             + linesep\
00033             + self.ii.atom1+' '\
00034             + self.ii.atom1Type+' '\
00035             + self.ii.atom2+' '\
00036             + self.ii.atom2Type+' '\
00037             + str(self.potential["D"])+' '\
00038             + str(self.potential["a"])+' '\
00039             + str(self.potential["r0"])+' '\
00040             + '0.0 ' + str(self.potential["cutoff"])+' '\
00041             + self.getFlag(self.ii.DFit)\
00042             + self.getFlag(self.ii.aFit)\
00043             + self.getFlag(self.ii.r0Fit) + linesep
